header: Prophecy Against the King of Tyre

verse: The Lord spoke his word to me, saying:
“Human, say to the ruler of Tyre: ‘This is what the Lord God says:
“‘So this is what the Lord God says:
The Lord spoke his word to me, saying:
“Human, sing a funeral song for the king of Tyre. Say to him: ‘This is what the Lord God says:
The Lord spoke his word to me, saying:
“Human, look toward the city of Sidon and prophesy against her.
Say: ‘This is what the Lord God says:
“‘No more will neighboring nations be like thorny branches or sharp stickers to hurt Israel. Then they will know that I am the Lord God.

“‘This is what the Lord God says: I will gather the people of Israel from the nations where they are scattered. I will show my holiness when the nations see what I do for my people. Then they will live in their own land—the land I gave to my servant Jacob.

They will live safely in the land and will build houses and plant vineyards. They will live in safety after I have punished all the nations around who hate them. Then they will know that I am the Lord their God.’”
